Text: WTF guys...what the hell is this 3gp bullcrap...whatever its good quality i guess but come on. mp4 like before.
Hope this .3gp bs is just an April fool's joke
the quality is absolute fucking rubbish

PERFECT QUALITY!!!
and so small too! Awesome!
Whats with the comments saying the Quality is bad? it's exacly the same as the old formats.
I am using WMP with a kodec pack. computer plugged directly into a 42" HDTV and I'm sitting less than a meter away. it looks perfect. if you are having problems it's your computer/software not the upload that's causing them.
The quality is fine, I think people just complain because this format isn't going to work on other devices unless it's converted first.  That's just my assumption.

The quality looks the same as the .mp4 versions, and it's the same size too. Now I personally don't mind but .3gp seems to play on very few things compared to .mp4 so why bother making it .3gp if that is the only difference?

3gp?? hope this is just an april fools prank. please keep future releases as the standard file extentions in future, many devices do not play back this format, and even more people dont know how to convert it. not everyone watches video files on their phone or a computer.

3gp? Seriously? You know better than that, eztv.

Will not d/l. Will not seed.
dont know what you lot are chatting about. its a perfect copy, as always.
So that's a mp4 renamed to 3gp as a joke or actually a 3gp?
You're all a bunch of whining little bitches, gtfo if you don't like it.
